title: Web and Application Developer
description:
**Söker:** Webbplatsadministratör/Webbdesigner med Erfarenhet av Applikationsutveckling för Digital Hälsovård
  
  

**Om tjänsten:**  

Health Clinic Östermalm söker en mångsidig och erfaren Webbplatsadministratör och Webbdesigner med kunskap inom applikationsutveckling för att stärka vårt digitala team. Rollen innebär att både underhålla och utveckla vår webbplats samt bidra till utvecklingen av en innovativ digital hälsovårdsapplikation.
  
  

**Kvalifikationer:**  

Gedigen erfarenhet av webbdesign och utveckling
  
Språk Svesnka, Engelska, Persiska
  
Kunskap om CMS-system (WordPress, Joomla, etc.)
  
Erfarenhet av sökmotoroptimering (SEO)
  
Erfarenhet av underhåll och säkerhetsuppdateringar för webbplatser
  
Erfarenhet inom applikationsutveckling, gärna med fokus på digital hälsovård
  
Stark problemlösningsförmåga och noggrannhet
  
  

**Ansvarsområden:**  

Löpande underhåll och uppdateringar av webbplatsen
  
Design och implementering av nya funktioner och layout
  
Optimera webbplatsens prestanda och säkerhet
  
Designa och utveckla funktionalitet för digital hälsovårdsapplikationen
  
Säkerställa att lösningarna är användarvänliga och mobilanpassade
  
  

Vi erbjuder en kreativ och dynamisk arbetsmiljö med stora möjligheter till professionell utveckling. Om du är intresserad, skicka ditt CV och ett personligt brev till oss.

title: Experienced System and Software Developer Automotive
description:
**Job Description:**  

Dizayee Solutions AB is seeking an experienced System and Software Developer with a passion for innovation in the automotive industry. As part of our team, you will play a crucial role in designing, analyzing, and developing advanced software solutions that enhance both the functionality and safety of automotive systems. This role emphasizes IT and telecommunication system engineering, enabling seamless integration of software and hardware for next-generation automotive applications.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Design, develop, and sustain software solutions tailored for IT systems, automotive subsystems, and applications.
  
Conduct thorough analysis of requirements, specifications, and technical designs to produce reliable, high-performance software solutions.
  
Collaborate closely with hardware engineers, IT specialists, and telecommunications teams to deliver integrated systems that meet high standards of performance and safety.
  
Engage in system engineering tasks specific to IT and telecommunications, ensuring compliance with automotive industry standards.
  
Create and implement software solutions for database management and application development.
  
Diagnose and troubleshoot software and system issues, optimizing solutions for increased reliability and efficiency.
  
Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and new developments in automotive software engineering, IT systems, and telecommunications.
  
  

**Required Qualifications:**  

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related discipline.
  
Proven experience in software development, particularly in IT systems, database management, and telecommunications.
  
Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, Python, or Java.
  
Familiarity with automotive systems and protocols (e.g., ISO 26262, AUTOSAR, CAN, LIN).
  
Experience in system analysis, design, and integration, preferably within the automotive or related industries.
  
Knowledge of database management and software development life cycle (SDLC) methodologies.
  
Strong problem-solving abilities and a collaborative work approach.
  
  

**Preferred Qualifications:**  

Hands-on experience in the automotive industry or with embedded and telecommunication systems.
  
Understanding of safety-critical software development and automotive safety standards.
  
Ability to multitask and manage projects effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  
Join Dizayee Solutions AB and help shape the future of automotive technology with innovative, high-impact software solutions!

title: Full Stack Developer with Front End Focus
description:
In a world where product size labels are unreliable, Volumental is the footwear industry's leading FitTech™ company, using 3D scans and a one-of-a-kind, AI-powered recommendation engine to match everyone with the shoes that fit them best.
   

  

 Our vision is “a world without sizes, where every body fits.” With top brand and retail partners across the world including New Balance, Fleet Feet, XXL, The Athlete’s Foot, Red Wing Shoes, Intersport and Crocs, our footprint spans 3000+ stores across 58 countries, and growing! To date, we’ve gathered more than 60 million foot scans.
   

  

 These are exciting times at Volumental and we are looking for a full stack developer with front end focus to join us in crafting our new in-store foot scanning experience, powered by Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Computer Vision.
   

  

**What will you do?**
 You will work on our web application which is used together with our 3D foot scanner to provide shoe size recommendations for shoppers. The application reconstructs 3D models of the shopper’s feet. A combination of foot scans, retail purchase data and AI is used to produce the best shoe fit recommendations.
   

  

 We’re always working to innovate and come up with new ways to enhance the customer experience. In this creative process, you will play an important part!
   

  

**We Are Excited About You Because**
* You have worked at least 3 years professionally with front-end and back-end web development.
* You have experience with React and TypeScript and your primary focus is front-end.
* You also have experience with Python/Go and API design.
* You are a self-motivated and collaborative team member.
* You are excited to learn new things and to solve challenging problems.


**Required**
**Bonus - Not required but nice to have, absolutely let us know if you have experience with any of the following:**
* You have experience with GCP and SQL.
* You are interested in 3D and visualization frameworks like: Three.js, WebGL
* You have a degree in Computer Science or similar.


**What We Can Offer You**
* Work in a supportive scale-up environment
* Personal learning budget and access to coaching
* Flexible hybrid-remote work policy
* Opportunity to work with a great team of 20+ nationalities in our English-speaking office
* Occupational pension at ITP1 level
* Flexible Public Holidays Policy
* Options Program
* Parental pay top-up
* Wellness allowance
* Dog-friendly office

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
As the technology firm that created the mobile world and a rich history of 145 years of building ground-breaking solutions and innovative technologies supported by 60k+ patents, Ericsson has made it our business to make a mark. When joining our team at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you are welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.
   

  

 Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions (BEWS) is the group responsible for leading Ericsson’s Enterprise Networking and Security business. Our growing product portfolio spans across wide area networks, local area networks and enterprise security. We are the #1 global market leader in Wireless-WAN based enterprise connectivity solutions and are growing fast in enterprise Private 5G networks and Secure Access Services Edge (SASE) solutions.
   

  

**How Will You Contribute to the Company?**
 Ericsson Enterprise Solutions is on a mission to become number #1 in the Private Cellular Networks space with the Ericsson Private 5G (EP5G) product offering.
   

  

 The Ericsson Private 5G is a next-generation, private network, tailored to drive Industry 4.0, the modernization and digitalization of infrastructures and business process operations. Organizations gain secure and powerful 4G LTE and 5G Standalone (SA) connectivity allowing them to optimize and simplify business critical operations through data creation, collection, and analysis.
   

  

 We are now looking for a
 **Senior** 
**Software Developer** 
 who will join our Service Team that is accountable for developing the RAN Configuration Management (RCM) solution. The Service Team is composed of both backend developers and frontend developers; supported and led by the team's Engineering Manager and Product Owner.
   

  

 RCM, with its frameworks and services (e.g. CBRS domain proxy), is the central component that enables the users of EP5G to configure and manage the Radio Access Network (RAN), including CBRS based RANs, via the Network Management Portal (NMP).
   

  

**What Will You Do?**
* Design, develop, deploy and maintain the RCM suite of components/services written in Golang, Java and Python
* Lead and participate in Feature analysis, design and technical breakdown activities
* Coach the junior developers in the team, sharing your experience and lessons learned
* Troubleshoot development and production (live) environments
* Write automatic test cases
* Continuously deliver small batches of working software to our main branch


**Qualifications**
**Minimum Qualifications:**
* At least eight (8) years of professional experience developing software using Golang and/or Java, deployed into Google Cloud or AWS cloud environments
* Excellent problem solving qualities and a natural interest in learning new things
* A can-do mindset and behavior
* Experience using Python for automation and testing
* Familiarity with Kubernetes, Databases (mysql, postgres) and REST APIs
* Experience working in an Agile development team setup, e.g. Scrum
* Bachelor's degree


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience working full stack including frontend (JavaScript) development


**Why Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions?**
 At Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions, we are one team - all in on inclusion. Celebrating the uniqueness of our individual team members across the globe helps us build diverse teams where we all can thrive. Our connected, community-focused culture enables each one of us to perform at our best and fully be ourselves.
   

  

**Our Values Drive Everything We Do**
* Respect: we don't point a finger; we lend a hand.
* Integrity: we do the right thing, even when it is hard; we make fact-based decisions.
* Perseverance: we accept and embrace change; we have a passion to win!
* Professionalism: we hold each other accountable.


 We are creating the future of global connectivity and community. Come join us. You belong here.
   

  

**Compensation & Benefits At Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions**
 At Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions, we know that our people are the key to our success. We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package to help with your individual needs and goals.
   

  

**Your Pay**
 Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers a competitive salary with a focus on a global market. For many roles, the compensation package includes annual and incremental incentive plans; certain eligibility and pro-ration rules apply. The actual salary offered is dependent on various factors including, but not limited to, location, the candidate’s combination of job-related knowledge, qualifications, skills, education, training, and experience.
   

  

**Your Health**
 Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers excellent, competitive employee benefits. Our global team members are eligible to participate in customary health and other benefit plans and programs based on location.
   

  

**Your Financial Security**
 Where available, Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers an employee retirement plan.
   

  

**Your Time**
 Your work-life balance is important to us. Where locally applicable, Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions provides generous paid time off, including: Flexible Time Off (FTO), four paid quarterly well-being days, and a Global Holiday schedule. Certain pro-ration rules apply to some time off benefits.
   

  

**Additional Benefits**
 Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers other company-paid benefits such as a comprehensive International Employee Assistance Program, No Internal Meeting Fridays, and volunteer paid time off.
   

  

*Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions’ Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging mission is to create an inclusive work environment where all employees’ differences are celebrated, their thoughts matter, and everyone feels safe to bring their authentic selves to work. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer and aim to attract, develop, and engage top talent from a diverse candidate pool. It is our policy and commitment to provide equal opportunity employment for all persons and not discriminate in employment decisions by placing the most qualified person in each job, without regard to any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.*
**Please note:** 
 Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions does not accept agency resumes and is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes. Please do not forward resumes to Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions employees.

title: Senior Node.js Developer
description:
At Anyfin HQ, nestled in the vibrant heart of Stockholm, we’re on a mission to transform the financial world. By equipping people with smart, innovative tools, we’re changing how individuals manage their financial well-being on an international scale. Our vision is clear and powerful: to improve the financial health of every individual, one debt at a time.
   

  

**About Us:** 
 Since our inception in 2017, we’ve helped thousands of Swedes, Finns, Germans, and Norwegians take back control of their finances, saving millions by refinancing costly consumer credit. But this is just the beginning. With new markets to conquer, cutting-edge tools, and ambitious products on the horizon, we are constantly seeking new ways to elevate people’s financial situations. And to reach these bold goals, we need passionate and talented individuals like you.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a
 **Senior Node.js Developer** 
 at Anyfin, you’ll dive deep into building and optimizing complex financial backend systems. You’ll be part of a fast-paced startup environment, collaborating with driven colleagues who thrive on innovation. Our team values growth, diversity, and adaptability, and you’ll have the chance to contribute to impactful projects from your very first day.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Specialize in backend development, utilizing Node.js and SQL to build robust and scalable financial systems.
* Tackle complex coding challenges, crafting new backend solutions, and refining existing ones.
* Work with TypeScript, GraphQL, Postgres, and occasionally touch on React, but the backend will be your primary focus.
* Contribute to the design and architecture of financial platforms, ensuring the scalability and reliability of our systems.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to shape both product and business strategies.
* Share your backend expertise with the team, championing best practices and continuous learning.


**Who You Are**
* Proficient in Node.js and backend in general. Experience with SQL databases (preferably Postgres) is essential.
* You have a passion for solving intricate backend problems, especially in high-stakes environments like finance.
* At least 5 years of professional experience in software development. Experience with financial systems is a huge plus.
* A good understanding of system design, clean code, and pragmatic problem-solving.
* Bonus points if you’re familiar with React, Python, Go, GraphQL,Kubernetes, Google Cloud/AWS or DevOps with Github Actions but your backend experience will take center stage here.


**Why Join Us?** 
 We promise you’ll be challenged and pushed to develop your skill set, all while working alongside a talented and ambitious team. Though we’ve made significant strides, the most exciting part of our journey is just beginning. Plus, we offer competitive compensation, a cozy centrally-located office, extra time off on your birthday, and many other benefits we’ll tell you about when we meet.
   

  

 Are you ready to be a key player in revolutionizing financial well-being? We can’t wait to receive your application!
   

  

 We believe that innovation thrives in person, so we work from the office four days a week to foster collaboration and creativity.
   

  

**Please note that we are not offering relocation support for this position.**
 Anyfin is a Swedish fintech on a mission to improve financial well-being and revolutionize debt management. We empower consumers to track all of their credits and loans in one place and reduce the costs of high-interest credits.

title: Software Engineer - Roku (Brightscript)
description:
**Description**
**About the Team**
 We are passionate about technology and building fantastic software products. We are experts and leaders in the realm of video streaming. It’s no coincidence that some of our customers are giants like Netflix, Spotify, BBC, HBO and Deutsche Telekom, just to name a few. Our mission is to innovate continuously and to disrupt the industry by creating a scalable platform for building impactful video applications. Accedo One , our award-winning produc t is a testament to Accedo’s expertise and leadership worldwide.
   

  

 To continue to excel, we are growing our team with multiple openings! We’re looking for a Roku Engineer to join our team in Stockholm. (Did we say we have offices all over the world, including Stockholm, Budapest, London, New York, Toronto, Sydney, and Hong Kong, amongst others?). At Accedo you will be part of a diverse and multi-disciplined development team, gaining exposure to cutting edge technologies.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Competitive salary and benefits
* Premium pension plan
* Company life, health and injury insurance
* Yearly health allowance
* Yearly training budget - which can be spent on IT conferences or online trainings
* Nice, spacious downtown office in the hip neighborhood of Södermalm
* Flexible home office options.
* Opportunity to participate in Hackathons and a range of company events


**What You Will Do**
 Primarily software development of Roku/Brightscript applications. You will work on delivering the Roku application of our state-of-the art products.
   

  

* You will play a key role in designing, building and maintaining large-scale, high availability front-end applications and owning the related platform infrastructure (e.g AWS services, build pipelines, automated testing, etc).
* You will also be responsible for promoting a sound engineering culture through hands-on development, code reviews, contributing to the improvement of the application architecture and enhancing engineering processes
* This is the team you want to join! We care about software craftsmanship, constantly improving our work and ourselves while having fun doing it!


**Requirements**
**What We Are Looking For**
* Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, IT or related discipline
* 3 - 5 years professional experience developing software applications
* Experience with Brightscript/Roku’s SceneGraph XML
* Experience integrating open source or 3rd party API’s and Libraries highly desirable
* Excellent problem solving skills and love for technical challenges
* Experience in Video and media based development projects (DRM, OVPs, Advertising, Analytics)
* Good command of English
* Due to Covid-19 and the associated impossibility for relocations, for now we can only accept applicants who hold a valid work permit or are eligible to work in Sweden.

title: Pega developer/Architect
description:
**We continue to grow within Pega and we need certified experts – Are you in for this challenge?**
**The Role**
 Together with experienced and specialized colleagues, you help our customers with everything from advice in early stages to the implementation and integration of the Pega platform. Our global experience and expertise within Pega give us a unique opportunity to effectively solve our customers’ challenges when it comes to quickly introducing changes to new business needs and opportunities. We continuously help you to develop your skills, certifications and interesting customer assignments for a solid career development.
   

  

**Your profile**
* Experience in BPM / CRM development
* Good knowledge of both Swedish and English, oral as writing is a must
* A great drive to develop and adopt new technology


**Preferably Certified Within Pega As**
* CSSA
* CLSA


**We Offer**
* A positive work environment with a strong focus on innovation and customer excellence.
* You will be working with many of the latest technology trends within Business process management (BPM), primarily within Pega and be surrounded by skilled colleagues. At Capgemini, you will be part of a global organization with high client focus, collaborative culture, and an opportunity for continuous learning and development.
* Our Pega development team in Stockholm consists of +40 colleagues who are delivering projects to our clients, taking end-to-end responsibility to ensure that the right architecture and solution is implemented.
* We are the largest Pega practice in the Nordics and Capgemini has experience from multiple successful implementations in the Nordic market.
* The Nordics are the #1 in Capgemini Europe and we will continue to build on our success


**In general**
* Exciting career opportunities locally and internationally, and fantastic networks of expertise. With over 4000 colleagues in Sweden only, you are part of a sharp, technology and business focused community, where Coursera and more than 250 000 (!) courses and certifications are offered to all employees.
* A variety of innovative projects with well-known clients and world-leading partners – being part of a global, long-standing, successful and rapidly expanding organization.
* An inclusive corporate culture where Diversity is our most important guiding principle. We are continuously engaged in initiatives that promote diversity and women in tech; we run LGBTQ networks and aim for inclusion in all types of staff activities – from sports club to art association. Please find out more about Capgemini as an employer HERE.
* All employees are covered by a collective agreement and receive occupational pension, insurance, parental benefits and health care allowance – among other best-in-class benefits.


**In Recent Employee Surveys, Our Employees Particularly Emphasized**
* A friendly and flexible workplace culture
* Supportive managers and freedom of speech
* Strong values and diversity focus
* Good work-life balance


**Our Values**
* Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: International Business Developer - Sectra Communication
description:
**Do you like a challenge? Do you want to join a market leading company and help us secure countries "deepest" secrets?**
 At Sectra, we create technology that contribute to a healthier and safer society. You will be given the opportunity to put your skills to real use, challenge yourself, and make a difference within our society. As a Business Developer you will work in a sales team and be responsible for sales of cryptographic products and services to our customers internationally. Our solutions for critical IT and communication security play a key role in our mission to strengthen the stability and efficiency of society’s most important functions. Now we are looking for you who want to be a part of this great journey.
   

  

**Working as a Business developer**
 The role includes responsibilities such as:
   

  

* Identifying, developing and managing sales of Sectras secure communication products and services to new and/or existing customers, within a designated region or market segment
* Upholding the commercial relationship with the customer and drive business growth
* Delivery of committed results in time
* Acquiring and maintaining knowledge of applicable Sectra products


 "Our customers are passionate and take part in the development of our products. Every customer visit gives me new ideas and insights which can be taken back to my colleagues."
   

  

 ,
   

  

 At Sectra, we hire for attitude and ability – train for skill. This means who you are is more important than your previous experiences. There are a few core abilities that are central for any role. We always look for your willingness and ability to learn and take on new tasks fast, utilize previous experiences and quickly grasp new information. We also want you to have a strong analytical mindset in which we consider it to be important that you can understand and break down and solve problems. We also look for good communicators who have the ability to interact with colleagues, partners and customers in an effective, clear and constructive way.
   

  

 In addition to these abilities, we also want you to:
   

  

* Have a bachelor’s degree in business or a related field
* Have proven work experience as a Sales Representative or Key Account Manager in IT (solution selling) or in defence industry (counter surveillance)
* Be fluent in Swedish/Dutch and English language
* Be highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
* Have excellent selling/presentation, negotiation and communication skills
* Have time management and organizational skills
* Have the ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs
* Have relationship management skills and openness to feedback


**Other information:**
 For this position you need a Swedish or Dutch citizenship.
   

  

 We will look at applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here.

title: Oracle EPM developer till storbank
description:
Är du passionerad över teknik och vill göra en verklig skillnad i finansvärlden? Ta chansen att bli en del av ett högpresterande team på en av Sveriges ledande storbanker.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, möjlighet till distansarbete 1-2 dagar i veckan
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 I rollen som Oracle EPM utvecklare kommer du fokusera på att underhålla och utveckla finansiella lösningar för storbankens kunder. För att lyckas i rollen har du en god analytisk förmåga och goda tekniska kunskaper tillsammans med en god förståelse för affärs- och finansiella processer.
 


  


 Du kommer att ingå i ett agilt högpresterande team bestående av fyra personer med olika inriktningar inom teknik och ekonomi. Rollen är initialt ett konsultuppdrag via Academic Work, med möjlighet till överrekrytering.
 


  


  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**



  

  
* Skapa skräddarsydda Oracle-lösningar: Designa och implementera Oracle-verktyg som överensstämmer med bästa praxis och företagets affärsbehov.
  
* Optimera prestanda: Övervaka och finjustera systemen för att säkerställa högsta effektivitet.
  
* Lösa problem: Vara i framkant när det gäller att lösa problem och säkerställa smidig och effektiv drift.
  
* Samarbeta: Arbeta nära med ett mångsidigt team, dela insikter och driva kontinuerlig förbättring.
  


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Utbildningsmöjligheter: Tillgång till utbildningsprogram och kontinuerliga läranderesurser.
  
* Stöttande team: Under din introduktion kommer du arbeta dedikerat med en kollega som stöttar dig i din utveckling.
  
* Inkluderande kultur: En vänlig och välkomnande miljö där alla kan trivas.
  
* Innovationshub: Bli en del av ett innovativt företag i framkant av tekniken.
  
* Moderna arbetsmetoder: Omfamna agila och moderna arbetsmetoder.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Relevant examen: Exempelvis inom IT/datavetenskap eller ekonomisk bakgrund.
  
* Språk: Flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
  
* Tidigare erfarenhet: Dokumenterad teknisk kompetens från tidigare yrken eller projekt.
  
* EPM-expertis: Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att konfigurera och utveckla EPM-lösningar.
  
* Grundläggande förståelse: Programmering och affärssystem.
  
* Mycket goda kunskaper i engelska i tal och skrift
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har:**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av FCCS (Financial Consolidation Close)
  
* Erfarenhet av group accounting
  
* Goda kunskaper i Svenska i tal och skrift
  


  


  

**Personliga egenskaper för att lyckas i rollen:**



  

  
* Analytisk förmåga
  
* Proaktiv problemlösare
  
* Initiativtagande
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Filippa Danell Karlberg eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107325

title: Technical Sales Consultant (SaaS & Cloud Solutions)
description:
**Siemens Digital Industries Software** 
 is a leading provider of solutions for the design, simulation, and manufacture of products across many different industries. Formula 1 cars, skyscrapers, ships, space exploration vehicles, and many of the objects we see in our daily lives are being conceived and manufactured using our Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software.
   

  

 We are looking for a dynamic and technically proficient Cloud Technical Sales to join our team. In this role, you will be the bridge between our customers and our innovative SaaS solutions, helping them understand how our offerings are deployed, secured, and maintained. You will play a critical role in guiding our customers through complex cloud infrastructure topics, whether they're comparing on-premises solutions with cloud-based services or evaluating different cloud deployment strategies.
   

  

 Additionally, you will take ownership of our internal cloud demonstration environments, which are vital in showcasing our product capabilities. These environments, primarily hosted on AWS, require a strong understanding of AWS services and the ability to securely integrate them with our solutions.
   

  

 Does it sound like a match?
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

**Customer Engagement & Solutions Consultation**
* Work closely with customers to explain the technical architecture and deployment strategies of our SaaS solutions.
* Guide customers in understanding security best practices, infrastructure options, and the integrations required between on-premises and cloud solutions.
* Present solutions for cloud environments hosted on various hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP) and help clients understand how these services can be used to improve scalability, performance, and latency.
* Clearly communicate the benefits of cloud vs. on-premises solutions, helping customers make informed decisions based on their unique business needs.


**Technical Ownership of Cloud Demonstration Environments**
* Manage, maintain, and optimize our internal cloud demonstration environments, primarily hosted on AWS, ensuring they are always available and up to date.
* Collaborate with internal teams to continuously improve the performance, security, and scalability of our demo environments.
* Configure and install software within these environments to simulate real-world customer scenarios.


**Cloud Services Expertise**
* Deep understanding of AWS services, with the ability to architect and explain secure and scalable deployments for our solutions.
* Stay updated with the latest advancements in cloud technologies, and help customers leverage these services to drive their business forward.


**Qualifications**
* Proven experience as a Technical Sales or in a similar technical customer-facing role.
* Strong knowledge of SaaS solutions, cloud architectures, and hybrid (on-premises and cloud) integration models.
* Expertise in AWS services (EC2, RDS, S3, VPC, Lambda, IAM, etc.) and best practices for securely deploying and maintaining cloud-based applications.
* Ability to clearly communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience with comparing on-premises and cloud-based solutions, highlighting the benefits and trade-offs of each.
* Familiarity with multi-cloud environments and hyperscalers like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.
* Solid understanding of security protocols and compliance requirements for cloud services.
* Hands-on experience installing, configuring, and maintaining software in cloud and on-premises environments.
* Ability to manage and maintain demonstration environments that are used for product demos and technical showcases.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, ability to build strong customer relationships.
* A collaborative attitude, able to work across different teams and departments.
* Highly organized and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Passion for technology, cloud computing, and continuous learning.


 Nice to have
   

  

* AWS Certified (Solutions Architect, Developer, or similar).
* Experience with other cloud platforms (Azure, GCP) is a plus.
* Strong analytical, problem-solving, and troubleshooting skills.
* Experience in a SaaS company or with cloud-native solutions is highly desirable.

title: Staff Software Engineer – JVM/Rust Expert (Bangkok-based, Full Relocation Package Provided)
description:
****About Agoda****
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

****About Agoda****
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Get to know our team – Observability Platform in Agoda**
 Within the WhiteFalcon team, we build and maintain Agoda’s time series database and log aggregation system. We process tens of millions of measurements per second and hundreds of terabytes of logs per day in multiple datacenters, powering thousands of dashboards and alerts. Our biggest challenges are to support the ever-growing need for collecting more data, faster and at lower cost.
   

  

**In This Role, You’ll Get to**
* Build fault-tolerant, horizontally scalable solutions running in multi-tenant environments
* Solve challenging problems in distributed and highly concurrent environment
* Impact all developers in Agoda, providing better observability instruments


****What You’ll Need To Succeed****
* At least 8 years of experience writing performant and scalable code using JVM (Java/Scala/Kotlin) or Rust (C++) languages
* User/dev experience of one of the following products: Prometheus, InfluxDB, Victoria Metrics, Elasticsearch, Grafana Loki
* Production experience with messaging queues (Kafka)
* Deep understanding of concurrency and multithreading
* Value code simplicity and performance
* Demonstrate proficiency in communication and collaboration skill


**It’s Great If You Have**
* Strong background in DB internals, indexes, data formats (AVRO, Protobuf)
* You generally understand observability data types, such as logs and metrics
* Profilers, debuggers, tracers hide no secrets from you, especially in a Linux environment
* Experience building large-scale time series data stores and monitoring solutions
* Experience with S3 (Ceph), Elasticsearch, Grafana and other open-source components
* You can get down to the low-level when needed

title: Senior Fullstack .NET utvecklare
description:
**Vårt kontor ligger centralt i Stockholm med utsikt över kanalen, precis vid Barnhusbron. Här sitter vårt Fullstack .NET team som vi just nu letar erfarna utvecklare till!**
 Fullstack .NET teamet är ett medelstort team på ca 20 personer utspridda på ett antal olika uppdrag. De flesta kör en kombo av hemarbete, arbete hos kund och arbete på vårt Capgemini-kontor. Ett uppskattat inslag när vi hänger tillsammans i teamet är gemensam fredagsfika, regelbundna teammöten och gemensamma aktiviteter. Vår vision är att vara ett team som opererar brett med kompetens att leverera end to end-lösningar till våra kunder.
   

  

**OM ROLLEN**
 I rollen som utvecklare arbetar du i ett agilt utvecklingsteam och tillsammans med erfarna kollegor kommer du att ansvara för komplexa system och lösningar hos våra kunder. Du kommer att ha en viktig och ansvarsfull roll i projekten du jobbar i, därför är det viktigt att du gillar utmaningar, ansvar och att driva saker framåt. Tillsammans med teamet deltar du i alla utvecklingsfaser, från kravanalys till utveckling och leverans. Vidare kommer du som utvecklare även att fokusera på effektivisering, kundnytta och att skapa lönsamma affärer!
   

  

 Tillsammans med dina kollegor hjälper du våra kunder att digitalt transformera och modernisera sina verksamheter. Vårt breda kunderbjudande omfattar allt ifrån rådgivning i tidiga faser till implementation och förvaltning.
   

  

**DIN PROFIL**
* Minst tre års erfarenhet från utveckling i .NET, C#
* Mycket goda kommunikationskunskaper i både svenska och engelska
* Ett stort driv att utvecklas och ta till dig ny teknik
* Har högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom datavetenskap, datateknik, informationsteknik eller likvärdig utbildning
* Fördelaktigt om du har erfarenhet av Azure, DevOps, Dockers, Kuberneters, Microservices


**VAD VI TROR KOMMER FÅ DIG ATT TRIVAS**
* Föräldraförmån
* Flexibla arbetsförhållanden & Work-from-Home Policy
* Tech communities
* Mentorskapsprogram (som mentor eller mentee)
* Delaktighet i Capgeminis olika fokusområden; Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club, Art club etc.
* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag & tjänstepension
* Möjlighet till bonusprogram
* Kompetensutveckling i form av utbildningar och certifieringar
* Roliga och inspirerande personalevent
* Företagshälsovård & sjukvårdsförsäkring


**ANSÖKAN**
 Vi rekryterar löpande till denna roll, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Från att vi kontaktar dig tar processen cirka 2-3 veckor då vi i största möjliga mån arbetar agilt i rekryteringsprocessen, vilket innebär att flera steg kan ske parallellt.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**OM CAPGEMINI**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

* Strong C programming skills.
* Experience with automotive standards, particularly in powertrain.

title: Senior lösningsarkitekt till stadsledningskontoret
description:
Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.


Stadsledningskontoret är kommunstyrelsens förvaltning. Vi ansvarar för styrning, uppföljning och utveckling av stadens verksamheter utifrån den vision och budget som kommunfullmäktige har beslutat om. Vi är drygt 300 anställda som i huvudsak arbetar med strategiska frågor som har stor betydelse för stadens verksamheter.


**Vi söker en senior lösningsarkitekt som vill vara med i Stockholms stads fortsatta satsning på digital utveckling inom socialtjänsten.**

 **Välkommen till oss**  

På avdelningen för it och digitalisering ingår enheten Centrala system som består av 15 personer. Vi sitter i fina och ljusa lokaler intill Stadshuset på Hantverkargatan 3D. Vår arbetsmiljö kännetecknas av goda möjligheter att få vara med och påverka, stort eget ansvar, omväxlande och utmanande arbetsuppgifter.

 **Vi erbjuder dig**

* Stora möjligheter till att bidra till samhällsnytta och vara med och skapa morgondagens Stockholm
* En kreativ arbetsplats där kompetens och samarbete är en viktig grund för arbetsglädje och goda resultat.
* Tydliga mål och ansvarsområden där ett stort eget ansvar råder
* Goda kompetensutvecklingsmöjligheter
* Stort nätverk inom Stockholms stad med många samarbetsytor.
* Flexibel arbetstid och friskvårdsbidrag, med träningslokaler i nära anslutning till arbetsplatsen. Läs mer om våra förmåner här: förmåner Stockholms stad

 **Om objektet**  

Objekt Sociala system är ett samlingsnamn för de it-stöd som Stockholms stad använder för bland annat dokumentation inom socialtjänsten, äldreomsorgen och den kommunala hälso- och sjukvården. I Sociala system ingår såväl egenutvecklade system som anpassade standardprodukter, integrationer och e-tjänster.


Med sina cirka 25 000 användare utgör Sociala system ett av stadens största objekt. Sociala system används för närvarande av medarbetare och chefer från 15 olika nämnder samt av externa leverantörer av välfärdstjänster som arbetar på uppdrag av staden.


Objektet har en framtagen målbildsarkitektur och en livscykelplan som beskriver hur objektets ingående delar behöver moderniseras och förändras för att kunna möta nya behov. Objektet står därför inför större utvecklingssatsningar, både när det gäller nya användarnära lösningar och ny it-arkitektur. Målet är stabila, tillgängliga, användarvänliga och säkra systemstöd som förenklar verksamheternas arbete. Det förväntas i förlängningen bidra till nytta för dem vi finns till för – stockholmarna.


Stockholms stad har en mycket hög grad av outsourcing inom it-området. I princip all drift, förvaltning och teknisk utveckling hanteras genom stadens olika nyckelleverantörer vilka är viktiga samarbetsparter i denna roll. Stadsledningskontoret ansvarar för objektets it-nära förvaltning. Socialförvaltningen och äldreförvaltningen ansvarar för objektets verksamhetsnära förvaltning.  

  

  

  

**Din roll**  

Vi genomför nu större utvecklingssatsningar där du kommer få en nyckelroll. Utifrån ett it-arkitekturperspektiv ansvarar du för att objektets ingående delar förvaltas och utvecklas på ett korrekt sätt enligt prioriterade krav från verksamheten, beslutad målarkitektur och stadens övergripande styrning och riktlinjer inom området. Det betyder att du säkerställer återanvändning av funktionalitet, lösningens förvaltningsbarhet samt att it-arkitekturprinciper och riktlinjer kring standarder följs.


I det dagliga arbetet hanterar du en bred palett av arbetsuppgifter tillsammans med kollegor och våra nyckelleverantörer. Du kommer vara länken mellan verksamhet och it, där en del av arbetet är kravfångst och att översätta verksamhetsbehov till it-krav. Då det operativa förvaltnings- och utvecklingsarbetet utförs av våra nyckelleverantörer är leverantörs- och leveransstyrning kritiskt viktiga arbetsuppgifter som du behärskar väl. I arbetet ingår även produktionsplanering och uppföljning av produktionsstatus.

 **Kvalifikationer**  

För denna tjänst krävs:

* universitetsutbildning inom it, till exempel datavetenskap eller systemvetenskap, eller annat ämne som vi bedömer relevant
* erfarenhet av att leda andra i uppdrag
* flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet inom it-förvaltning
* flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt och av teknisk kravställning
* erfarenhet av leverans-/leverantörsuppföljning
* god pedagogisk förmåga att förklara tekniska frågeställningar och utmaningar till personer med mindre eller ingen teknisk kompetens
* vana att arbeta enligt ITIL-processer
* goda kunskaper i svenska både i tal och i skrift.


Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:

* agil utvecklingsmetodik
* moderna mjukvaruarkitekturer där du arbetat både med plattforms- och mjukvarustrategier
* tekniska plattformar såsom php, .Net och Java
* säkerhetsramverk som t.ex. ISO 27001, NIST CSF, CIS Controls
* förvaltningsstyrning enligt pm3
* rollen som objektledare it
* kunskap om socialtjänstens verksamhetsområden  

  

För att lyckas i denna roll krävs förmåga att styra it-arkitekturfrågor i en stor och komplex organisation där it i mycket hög grad är outsourcad. I relationen med kollegorna inom den verksamhetsnära förvaltningen är du en ödmjuk och inlyssnande partner samtidigt som du utifrån din kompetens vågar och vill föreslå alternativ, utmana till nytänkande och delta i utvecklingen av nya arbetssätt. En framgångsfaktor kommer att vara din förmåga att agera med trovärdighet i flera olika sammanhang.

 **Personliga kompetenser**  

Vid den här rekryteringen lägger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och vi kommer behandla följande fem kompetenser under intervjuerna:

*Utvecklingsinriktad.* Objekt Sociala system genomför nu en spännande förändringsresa med flera parallella utvecklingsinitiativ och projekt. För objektet innebär det både utveckling av nya samarbeten och arbetssätt, nya it-utvecklingsprojekt och upphandling och införande av nya system.


Din goda *samarbetsförmåga* är helt avgörande för att lyckas i rollen. Du behöver tycka om att bygga upp och underhålla många olika relationer. Du besitter sociala förmågor som möjliggör ett gott samarbete med många olika kontaktytor, till exempel med kollegor på den egna enheten och avdelningen, kollegor inom objektet som är anställda på andra förvaltningar i staden, våra it-leverantörer och inhyrda konsulter.

*Självgående.* Den här rollen kräver att du är en senior person som är van att leda dig själv. Du kommer få ett stort ansvar att taktiskt styra och leda den tekniska utvecklingen och det är viktigt att du kan yrket och har erfarenhet från liknande arbetsuppgifter, både inom ramen för objektsförvaltning och it-utvecklingsprojekt.

*Mål- och resultatorienterad.* Du behöver kunna leverera enligt fastlagd plan och uppställda mål. Du besitter förmågan att kunna agera, planera om och förändra inriktning när målen och förutsättningar ändras.

*Kommunikativ*. Du har förmåga att målgruppsanpassa din kommunikation så att du framgångsrikt kan diskutera eller förklara en teknisk lösning för kollegor inom objektet som inte behärskar tekniken.

 **En varm hälsning från din blivande chef**  

Maria Nielsen heter jag och det är jag som är din blivande chef. Jag är en engagerad och tillgänglig ledare som skapar förutsättningar för att dina idéer ska få en plattform och för att du ska lyckas i dina uppdrag. Jag hjälper dig att navigera och prioritera så du kan växa och utvecklas tillsammans med mig och våra kollegor. Jag tycker det är viktigt att du och mina övriga medarbetare trivs och mår bra på jobbet och jag förespråkar frihet under eget ansvar.

 **Övrigt**


Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.


Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.
